import React, {Component} from 'react' import{Carousel, CarouselItem, CarouselCaption} from 'reactstrap' class Carouselku extends Component { state = { index: 0, direction: null } handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { this.setState({ index: selectedIndex, direction: e.direction }) } render() { return(

First slide label

Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue mollis interdum.

Second slide label

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

 ) } } export default Carouselku
